Html:
Since many things got broken with version 9.0 and we don't have time to fix all our code, is it possible to download TS 8.3 ? The MSI seems to have been removed, anyway this can be shared?
Thanks

They are all still there to download. Visit http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34790 and expand the "Details" section. You will see all previous releases linked to, with release notes.
Thanks man, I totally missed that! good to know!
